tokens.resolved_gloss: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed

tokens.resolved_gloss: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
tokens.translation: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to bore, i.e. (by implication) to wound, to dissolve; figuratively, to profane (a person, place or thing), to break (one's word), to begin (as if by an 'opening wedge'); to play (the flute)
tokens.translation: properly, to bore, i.e. (by implication) to wound, to dissolve; figuratively, to profane (a person, place or thing), to break (one's word), to begin (as if by an 'opening wedge'); to play (the flute)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, the nearest part, i.e. the center, whether literal, figurative or adverbial (especially with preposition)
